description: Grove describes this stop as �a single 4' rank in two halves�. Williams calls it �a single 4' stop with a brilliant treble�.
examplesDescription: Bajoncillo y Clarín 4', Manual I; Parroquia de Santa Maria, Echalar, Navarra, Spain; Alverdi & Marti 1902.
